title: 7-3 IN PLACEMENTS AND GOT BRONZE 5!!!
body:
I Played my season 6 placement matches and got bronze 5 after going 7 wins to 3 loses WHY AND HOW!!!! (Was bronze 4 last season and silver 5 season 4). 

Also i thought if you where bronze your MMR got reset to normal? {{champion:32}} {{item:3070}} soooooooooooooo whyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyy!!!!!!!!

replies.body:
I feel your pain dude, similar happened to me. You are certainly not the first person who has experienced this (Just check the forums, hundreds of threads of people complaining) but they all seem confused, your MMR does not get hard reset. It's just a soft reset. Your MMR is still around the bronze level.
Just use it as fuel to climb harder, I'm sure going to.
